description: Lists all of the field options for a field identifier in the domain.

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

parameters.name: fieldId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of a field.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: A list of FieldOption values to filter on for ListFieldOptions. (string) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. This is null if there are no more results to return.

nested_items.name: active
nested_items.description: Describes whether the FieldOption is active (displayed) or inactive.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: FieldOptionName has max length 100 and disallows trailing spaces.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: FieldOptionValue has max length 100 and must be alphanumeric with hyphens and underscores.
